pullrequest.title: load Utils.cmake again after calling find_package(ignition-cmake) to restore macros

content.raw:
that was the default branch build

this branch makes it farther but fails to compile:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org//job/ignition_gui-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/34

probably need to use a new commit for the ignition-msgs1 formula. do you want to try updating it?

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/blob/master/ignition-msgs1.rb
